text: Revolutionary Communist Organisation, Nepal () was a communist faction in Nepal. The group operated in the Bagmati, Janakpur and Koshi zones. The group publish Vargyuddha (Class War). In April 1980, the group merged into the Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist). ==Sources== *Rawal, Bhim Bahadur. Nepalma samyabadi andolan: udbhab ra vikas. Kathmandu: Pairavi Prakashan. p. 84, 163. Category:Defunct communist parties in Nepal Category:Organizations disestablished in 1980 Category:1980 disestablishments in Asia
title: Revolutionary Communist Organisation, Nepal
